    • With TWiML we are building a vibrant local community to support and advance women in the field of Machine Learning. Based in T端bingen, our mission is to create a network where women can share knowledge, foster professional growth, and inspire each other to reach new heights in their careers.

    Our goal is simple yet powerful: to connect women in Machine Learning, providing them with resources and support and helping them to share their research. By facilitating discussions on cutting-edge scientific topics and career development, we aim to create a space where innovation and collaboration flourish.


    Why join TWiML?
    • Community Building: Be part of a supportive network of women who share your passion for Machine Learning.
    • Learning Opportunities: Gain access to expert knowledge and stay updated on the latest trends in the field.
    • Professional Development: Enhance your career through workshops, mentorship, and networking events.
    • Inspiration and Collaboration: Engage with successful women in Machine Learning and draw inspiration from their journeys.
